queries.query:
from(bucket: "manufacturing")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "assembly_batteries")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "MakeupArea")

from(bucket: "manufacturing")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "assembly_batteries")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "CurrentShift")

from(bucket: "manufacturing")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "weldingrobot")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Current")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "manufacturing")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "weldingrobot")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Oiltemperature" or r["_field"] == "OiltemperatureTarget")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "manufacturing")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "assembly_batteries")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Line")

from(bucket: "manufacturing")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "weldingrobot")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Drive1_Voltage")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "manufacturing")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "weldingrobot")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Drive1_Speed")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "manufacturing")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "weldingrobot")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Filter_Reset")

from(bucket: "manufacturing")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "weldingrobot")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Drive1_Voltage" or r["_field"] == "Drive2_Voltage" or r["_field"] == "Drive3_Voltage")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "manufacturing")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "weldingrobot")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Cooler_ON")
